aboutSite: Hotel facilities and room booking website
descriptions: This site is created with an awesome UI design and implemented some features and functionality.And it is responsive to all devices.
Implemented OAuth for authorization and authentication by JSON web token. Users can book any book on those dates on which the room is not booked yet.
Created dashboard, used in dashboard recharts-package for AreaChart and PieChart. And it has a different view for admin and user.
Implemented slider, carousel, and animation. Hosted project in firebase & Backend site in Render.
technology: React, TailwindCss, Context-API, Node, MongoDB, Express, JSON web token, Firebase Dotenv, Swiper, Recharts, React-date-range, Axios, OAuth
userFeatures: User can see all room and his/her booked room through the dashboard.
User can delete his/her booked if dates is not overan update his/her profile
User can book any room with dates, adult, children
But users can not book on those dates on which the room is already booked.
User can give some review with rating
adminFeatures: Admins can add a room with detail
Admins can change a room's details
Admins can delete any user and any room
Admins can not delete and modify any review and rating.

descriptions: Implemented authentication by firebase and authorization by JSON web token. and without authentication & authorization users are not eligible to have access.
Created dashboard for admin and users. So they have some activities here like seeing orders, paying for their orders, updating their profile, etc.
Some activities for admin manage product adds a new product, make admin someone, Utilized stripe for payment method and nodeMailer, mail Gun to send mail
Hosted project in firebase & Backend site in Heroku.
technology: React, React-Bootstrap, Node, MongoDB, Express, JSON web token, Firebase, Dot env, React-Router, React-from-hooks
userFeatures: User can to purchase any product
User can to pay with card
User can delete his/her added product if he/she not paid yet. etc
adminFeatures: Admin can add, delete any product
Admin can shipping that product user paid
Admin can update his profile. etc

descriptions: Implemented authentication by firebase and authorization by JSON web token.
User handles updating system for any product,update a product quantity, like increase or Decrease.
User has been allowed to add a new product. and see his added product.
Hosted project in firebase & Backend site in Heroku.
technology: React, React-Bootstrap, Node, MongoDB, Express, JSON web token, Firebase, Dot env, React-Router, React-from-hooks
